channel.title: Art Fein – Lost In The Grooves

item.title: ANOTHER Fein Mess
item.dc:creator: garypiggold
item.description: Our good poker pal Li’l Art Fein has, as his March Fein Mess, the Just About Completely True Stories of how yours very truly came across My First Records and Concert, strictly rock ‘n’ roll-y speaking, of course. yes,  It’s nice to remember your First Time(usually…..)
item.content:encoded:
Our good poker pal Li’l Art Fein has, as his March Fein Mess, the Just About Completely True Stories of how yours very truly came across My First Records and Concert, strictly rock ‘n’ roll-y speaking, of course.

yes,  It’s nice to remember your First Time
(usually…..)
